I believe that it will be impossible to approach the pressing problem of what to do
with Associate members until some such an arrangement is worked out. And by all
means such v classification should go into effect with present membership.
To make this idea work, there is needed a system of rewards and punishments. This
might be based upon voting and other privileges, participation in certain activities
which would be mutually satisjfying to the member and the Association or any number
of combinations.
I offer this idea fur your sincere consideration. Sooner or later I believe we must
come to this or some similar plan.
